Package BTOManagementSystem.Controller

package BTOManagementSystem.Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationController
    Controller class responsible for handling Applicant applications
    ApplicationStatusController
     
    AuthController
    Controller class responsible for handling user authentication logic.
    BookingController
    Controller class responsible for handling the booking of flats for applicants who have been successfully approved for a BTO project.
    EnquiryController
    Controller class that handles all enquiry-related operations within the BTO Management System.
    MenuViewController
    Controller class responsible for directing users to their respective main menu views based on their role (Applicant, HDB Officer, or HDB Manager).
    OfficerRegistrationController
    Controller class responsible for handling officer registration requests to projects.
    PasswordController
    Controller class responsible for handling user password changes in the system.
    ProjectListController
    Controller class responsible for handling operations related to BTO project management.
    ReceiptController
    Controller class responsible for managing receipt-related operations, including generation and viewing of booking receipts based on filters.
    WithdrawalRequestController
    Controller class responsible for handling applicant withdrawal requests.
